title: This is why Solo Queue sucked

replies.body:
What if I told you

Dynamic queue just match you with the same players except they are in a premade and will flame the fuck outta you?

> [{quoted}](name=Snake on bush,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=xqwFETJR,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2016-06-01T20:19:52.271+0000)
>
> {{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}} 
> 
> # You still get bad players into your team.
> 
> # Doesn't matter  what the game mode is.

You don't get:

1 So much trolls
2 So much mid or feed shit in champ select
3 So much arguing

and

*MAINS

I'm a fucking Riven (pre nerfs riven 2013). I will carry the shit out of this game.
- ends up 0-11-2

and also there is way less flame. 
one person now flames if there is a flamer in the game.

Before in Solo Queue everyone was flaming every game and raging

> [{quoted}](name=spombjop,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=xqwFETJR,comment-id=00070000,timestamp=2016-06-01T20:22:32.379+0000)
>
> You don't get:
> 
> 1 So much trolls
> 2 So much mid or feed shit in champ select
> 3 So much arguing

And that is all thanks to the new Champion select.

Has nothing to do with soloQ or Dynamic Queue whatsoever.

> [{quoted}](name=Snake on bush,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=xqwFETJR,comment-id=000700000000,timestamp=2016-06-01T20:31:45.959+0000)
>
> And that is all thanks to the new Champion select.
> 
> Has nothing to do with soloQ or Dynamic Queue whatsoever.

it has.

Not really.  Yeah, salty kids will be salty... but the new champ select lets most people get their pref role.  It's fine.  It can stay.

Dynamic Queue is letting 3 and 4 man premades play ranked.  It is NOT fine.  It should NOT stay.  

These two are entirely different things... and the fact that they dropped them both at once is causing a LOT of this "but DQ is cool!" crap from people who don't know what they're talking about.
Nope.
"i can't get to diamond, it is because i have retarded players"

> [{quoted}](name=playfive Koopska,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=xqwFETJR,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2016-06-01T19:53:09.384+0000)
>
> "i can't get to diamond, it is because i have retarded players"

It's not about gaining elo, if your skill is diamond u will get in there, problem is waste of time caused by retarded queue which is now fixed. No more "mid or feed" shit.
What if i told you you could have the old soloq system with the new champ select?

> [{quoted}](name=Getattorex,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=xqwFETJR,comment-id=000500000001,timestamp=2016-06-01T20:07:33.688+0000)
>
> What if i told you you could have the old soloq system with the new champ select?

With queue time 20 minutes unless u pick support, so good! 
And this new autofill if a mid or feed didn't get mid he'll get support and he'll feed.

I dont know what game you have been playing, but i have less than 10 min queues, sometines less than 5 mins.

And i dont play support at all.

Another thing: trolls will always be trolls, dont blame soloq dynamicq or whatever system.

There is no waste of time, you had 4/9 to get bad players with you, 5/9 against you. You get bad players in dynamic shit fest, i did the experience and had 4 bot with me against  a premade. Match making is also retarded as ever.

No more mid or feed? get to diamond where there is auto fill for every game.

young
naive

> [{quoted}](name=ZeusHasRefresher,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=xqwFETJR,comment-id=000500000000,timestamp=2016-06-01T20:00:38.568+0000)
>
> There is no waste of time, you had 4/9 to get bad players with you, 5/9 against you. You get bad players in dynamic shit fest, i did the experience and had 4 bot with me against  a premade. Match making is also retarded as ever.
> 
> No more mid or feed? get to diamond where there is auto fill for every game.
> 
> young
> naive

Solo Queue is proven to be bad, they removed it for a reason. Everyone was complaining about solo queue. Even Faker was always playing duo with a jungler because it wasn't posible for him to reach rank 1 alone even if we all know that he is the best player in the world.

> [{quoted}](name=spombjop,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=xqwFETJR,comment-id=0005000000000000,timestamp=2016-06-01T20:17:55.534+0000)
>
> Solo Queue is proven to be bad, they removed it for a reason. 

No they didn't

 Everyone was complaining about solo queue, 
everyone= you? i see

. Even Faker was always playing duo with a jungler because it wasn't posible for him to reach rank 1 alone even if we all know that he is the best player in the world. 
YEA because When you are with a preamde you are stronger, that's THE FUCKING POINT OF PLAYING WITH A PREMADE which is why dynamic shit fest is frustrating as a solo player.

So how the first arg is even an arg?

and how having bad players IS EVEN an arg too? why pro players can smurf and get back to challenger in 1 or 2 days? it isn't why soloQ sucked, it is why YOU sucked.

> [{quoted}](name=ZeusHasRefresher,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=xqwFETJR,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2016-06-01T19:48:55.555+0000)
>
> So how the first arg is even an arg?
> 
> and how having bad players IS EVEN an arg too? why pro players can smurf and get back to challenger in 1 or 2 days? it isn't why soloQ sucked, it is why YOU sucked.

pros can't reach challenger in 1,2 days, even Dopa can't do it in 2 days. 
They can reach Diamond but hey their skill is challenger not diamond. That is telling u something?
Don't forget the "mid or feed" peoples x_x
I love you OP.

Long queue times are because of new champ select.
Dynamic queue is better than solo queue because of many things:
less trolls
more focus on the game instead of flaming
more tryhards - i usualy don't like tryhards but in ranked u have to tryhard to gain elo.

I find this hard to believe.
Less trolls? not from what i have seen they are still out in force.
More focus on the game instead of flaming? I almost can't go 2 games without someone cussing out a team mate,making racist,sexist,or in general dickish comments.
More tryhards? maybe most of the time i see people try and then i see feeders so this one i think is up for debate.

In what way does me playing solo queue give you a worse experience for your dynamic queue?

What made you to be such a terrible person that you get so much joy out of other people who don't share you views suffering that you actively try to make them suffer?
We don't want it back, that's it, everyone hated it.
noone will miss solo queue, i'm glad it's gone.
If you are 22/1/7 as fizz and you lose that is your own fucking fault.

> [{quoted}](name=eastcoastblaze,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=xqwFETJR,comment-id=000a,timestamp=2016-06-03T18:16:58.018+0000)
>
> If you are 22/1/7 as fizz and you lose that is your own fucking fault.

I was that fizz and that game should have ended in 20 min but i was trying so fucking hard to save that game, so game lasted for 30 minutes and i was the only problem to their overfed top and bot. So i gave my best to win unwinnable game but still lost. I don't remember all the detalis, it was 2 years ago.
All what i can say is fuck solo queue.
Rest in pepperonis Solo Queue, noone will miss u.
This statement could not be more false.

> [{quoted}](name=Deitrix,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=xqwFETJR,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2016-06-02T08:41:11.126+0000)
>
> This statement could not be more false.

everyone was bitching about solo queue for years so stfu

Not even the best elo boosters will every game. Most of them will drop games they are carrying in bronze just because of things such as team comps and enemies who are doing the right thing. Sure, once in a while I would drop a game where I was fed and doing all of the right things. But now I either take a long time to find a group and gain a small amount of LP, or I can lose because I went in solo. Solo queue was the way to go, sorry.
601 minions XDDDD!!!!
